doc.author: wangxin
doc.description: 无线接入网及其他月报

sql.name: wirelessaccesspage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: wirelessaccess.group
wirelessaccess.left
sql.item: select trim('GSM网BSC数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM900BSC数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM1800BSC数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM900、GSM1800BSC合设数量（户）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('基于软交换的BSC数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM基站数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM900基站数（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM1800基站数（户）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM小区数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('其中：GSM1800小区数（户）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM载频数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('其中：GSM1800载频数量（户）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GSM话音信道数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('其中：GSM1800话音信道数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GPRS/EGPRS无线分组数据静态信道数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('GPRS/EGPRS无线分组数据动态信道数量（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('交换机VLR最大登记客户数（户）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('SGSN最大附着客户数（户）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('HLR存储客户号码数（个）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('无线网处理最大话务量（ERL）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('无线网信道利用率（%）') as 月报指标 from dual union all select trim('支持半速率载频比例（%）') as 月报指标 from dual

sql.name: wirelessaccess.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('GSM网BSC数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市, nvl(sum(t.c802000016),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM900BSC数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市, nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM1800BSC数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市, nvl(sum(t.c802000018),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM900、GSM1800BSC合设数量（户'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市, nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('基于软交换的BSC数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市, nvl(sum(t.c802000020),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM基站数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市, nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM900基站数（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市, nvl(sum(t.c802000022),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM1800基站数（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000023),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM小区数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000024),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('其中：GSM1800小区数（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000025),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM载频数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000026),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('其中：GSM1800载频数量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000027),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GSM话音信道数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000035),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('其中：GSM1800话音信道数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000037),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GPRS/EGPRS无线分组数据静态信道数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000039),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('GPRS/EGPRS无线分组数据动态信道数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000041),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('交换机VLR最大登记客户数（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000045),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('SGSN最大附着客户数 （户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000063),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('HLR存储客户号码数（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000065),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('无线网处理最大话务量（ERL）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000067),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('无线网信道利用率（%）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(avg(t.c802000069),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('支持半速率载频比例（%）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(avg(t.c802000071),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002

sql.name: wirelessaccess.lastmonth
